topics.body:
Random post:
Apparently recently there's been some shit going on with some members that don't like me who I have argued with before on numerous occasions with the persons in questions not believing that I'm bisexual because I'm not flamingly stereotypical, aka cause I'm not going "~heyyyyy; how you doin?  I'm going to go get a manicure and a gucci bag" the person in question don't believe that I'm bisexual.

Apparently there's been some people that doubt that people who are say bisexual or gay are actually so because we don't fit into their definition of what it means to be or how people act.

If one of said persons is reading this I would like to clear that up that yes I am bisexual; while I do lean much more towards women I do like men as well.
